findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code doesn't follow Solidity style guide, which can make it harder to read and maintain.

findings.title: Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is declared but never used in the contract's functions.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract doesn't have all required events, which can cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: There is dead code in the contract that is never executed or reached during normal execution.

findings.title: Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: Local variables are used before they are declared, which can lead to unexpected behavior and errors.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations is incorrect in arithmetic calculations, which can cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Local variables are used without being initialized, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables configured on user-supplied input are missing proper checks for zero values, which can lead to problems during execution.

findings.title: Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract doesn't check if the result of transfer methods is successful, which can cause unexpected behavior or errors.
